title: what is the strength of students from north in pes??

comments.body: U will find ample no of people from north, every year the no of northies is increasing and the people of pes in general are mostly pleasant so there won't be much problem for you. And if u would take hostel, u can find many North Indians there
also college life kaisi hai?? like fests vagarah dhanke hote??
pessat ki bhi tips dedo thodi
PES fests are good but don't expect extraordinary things. You can search this sub for fest related stuff. Some fests are yet to return after COVID, but most are back.
Use https://bit.ly/pesu-faq to start off. Remaining tips you can ask once we open the PESU discord server for prospective students.

Fests are not that good. Maaya(ec campus fest) is really bad while aatmatrisha(RR campus) is also decent only nothing more. If u don't come with much expectations u would find the college life okay only but if u have come with expectations like a Karan Johar movie u would be utterly disappointed. I would say it's decent but not at the level of other pvt colleges like manipal or a bits
Do ur regular jee / bitsat prep it should be enough nothing special required

so overall is it worth joining or should i keep it as one of the options??  
not expecting much from jee  
vit srm bits are still left  
heard about the vit scam situation too

thanks  
doing arihant prep guide for bits rn

ohhoo okayy

whats the gender ratio btw?
PES is better than VIT and SRM IMO. If you don't get BITS then yes it's a good backup.
In our class it really sucks, just 9 girls in a class of 61 people, but there must be about 15-20 girls on average in other classes
Yeah that's good only for pessat
manipal main campus or pes?  considering i would join pes through pessat most probably
Manipal.
If u are getting cse and related branches in manipal and pes both go for manipal over pes . But pes cse is better than manipal non cse branches. If u aren't getting cs in pes then go for manipal

only for pessat matlab??  
is it not relevant for other exams like comedk vit and all??

wooooo

and most of them are south indian girls right??
Lol no, matlab pessat ke liye bhi acchi hi hai

bits ke liye ye karna sufficient hai  
also doing some jee main moderate pyqs  
will start giving bits mocks 10 may se tab tak thoda sa syllabus completion karna  
guide kardo TIA
Yeah, but thats true for boys too. But it's like u wouldn't find North Indian girls. They too mostly are able to find a friends circle

I have forgotten about pessat, jee and all bro. I gave it 2 years back and I don't wish to recall those days also. I just woke up and gave pessat and passed it without any special preparation. It would be better to ask a first year student. And I  flunked bitsat horribly in my time so I wouldn't be the right guy to answer

ohh so north ki ladkiya kam hai  


also are most of the students hostellers or day scholars??
Day scholars

damn man  
you must be a covid batch student :)  
online examss
anyways thanks for all the info
Online classes no online exams:(
pes vagarah offline??
Pessat ? nope

yes srm sabka online hota is saal bhi   
does phone come handy srmjee mai ;) ?
I used to be an honest student during my school time so I didn't use it  but it seems u can cheat easily . My friends hot rank <500 by cheating

damn man  
thanks
ic, ty
i see
Northie here. Life's good.  A majority of the people either speak or understand hindi, and no one discriminates against you except for perhaps a few nutjobs here and there lol
and what about pessat, level kaisa hai, someone is saying jee level and mera jee prep to fucked hai 12th aati hai dhang se

CET aur JEE ke beech mein, but more towards JEE than CET. English bhi hai toh capitalise on that. I'm not sure ki if the rumours about negative marking this year are true or not, but we didn't have that 2 years ago.

tyy  
also could you give me some idea on bitsat ki prep, currently doing jee main ke moderate pyqs and arihant guide  
kahi kehrhe ki arihant is not sufficient ab jitna tima hai usme yahi hopayega sirf :(
